Pick a time range for which you want the widget to show up.

"Apple TV remote added to room.

If your Apple TV is already paired with an Apple Remote, it won't respond to the Peel app unless you unpair it first.

Tap ALLOW to let us automatically do this for you."
"Peel can automatically switch remote controls when you link your room to a Wi-Fi network. Do you want to configure this now?"
Auto Switch Rooms Based on Location
When rooms are linked to WiFi networks, automatically switch rooms to show right remote
Automatically tune-in to a channel while powering on the device for the first time. Tap to customize.

To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
"You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
We have created a new activity called %1$s using your %2$s TV and %3$s %4$s.

Point your remote control to your mobile device. Press the remote control button.

1. Point your phone at %1$s.
2. Tap the %2$s button%3$s.

2. Point your phone at %1$s.

Enter your email to be notified when your channel has been added.

Create an account to save your settings
Linking an account lets you back up your remote control settings.
Import or Save Your Remote Setup
Make sure you have entered your username/email and password correctly and try again
Please upgrade Peel for faster performance, and to use the latest features and remotes. Tap Upgrade to continue. Thank You!
MFA verification is required to authenticate.
Use your voice for search and control
Enter your email to be notified when your %1$s brand is added to our list.
Enter your email to be notified when your TV service provider is added to our list.
"Our support team has received your report. We'll get back to you as soon as we have additional information. Thank you!"
Do you want us to enable access for remote control on your lock screen?
Require internet connection to download this code. Please connect to the internet and try again.
Wi-Fi is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
"There's a new version of Peel app available. Would you like to upgrade now?"
No channel guide is available for your location
We seem to be experiencing technical difficulties. Please check back again after sometime. Meanwhile, you can enjoy the remote.
No content available for the selected time slot and category
"Sorry, we do not currently support EPG in your country. If you'd like to setup EPG in another country tap "here.
Peel needs an active Internet connection to continue. Check your connection settings.
Check your connection or try again.
No internet, Connect and tap to retry
This could happen if we are unable to get schedules for your configured TV Provider or you have no channels in your lineup.Tap on the button below to edit your channel list.

First things first:

Please make sure your mobile device is connected to a Wi-Fi network.

A look at some of the features introduced in Peel App update
Personalized content recommendations sent to the user across Live TV and Streaming
Tune-in notifications sent during show air time, tailored to the user
User Feedback polls to improve remote control and content discovery experience

Push the button on your %1$s now.
Enter the code shown on your %1$s:
You’re just a few quick taps away from being able to control your TV from the %1$s and other apps as well as set reminders for your favorite shows and tune into them with one touch.
Cannot reset password without registered/verified email or phone number
Password should have 6 or more characters.

"Go to your phone's settings, then application manager. Select Peel Remote, and clear the cache, data and force stop. If you're still unable to set up your %1$s, it's likely that we don't currently support your device."
Picks the most recent channel from Recently Watched Channels of Trending show.
"No internet connection. Connect to internet and try again"
Allows the application send remote commands, and retrieve remote control information.

Please enter your %1$s brand and tap SEND.
Please enter your %1$s model number and tap SEND.
Congratulations! Your reminder is set for %s
Select the devices you want to turn on or off

Peel app can change %1$s channels by knowing the preset keys configuration of your TV remote control. For example, on your TV remote controller, press %1$s, then key 1, and see the resulting %1$s channel.
"We value your privacy. To review our privacy policy click " here
"Read Peel's Privacy Policy before using Peel Mi Remote. Access to the internet and location services is required for the app to work normally."
This program is not available in your region.
Bluetooth is turned off. This app uses bluetooth to find Pronto. Please turn on bluetooth on your device.
Please try to add the device again.
Turn bluetooth on in your phone or device settings.
Slide batteries into battery compartment as shown.
Make sure LED is on when you are trying to pair.
If LEDs are turned off, inserting a pin and holding it for 1 second will put Pronto into pairing mode.
Control your TV, Set-top box, AV Receiver, Roku, Apple TV, and Blu-ray/DVD. Compatible with 400,000+ devices.
"If you enjoy using Peel, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won't take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!"
Peel needs to access your account so that it can retrieve your Youtube videos, enable Contacts permission from Settings
Your recording request has been sent.
